name: .MLX
summary: Learn about .MLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an MLX file with The MathWorks MATLAB (multiplatform). To open an MLX file, select Open from the "HOME" or "EDITOR" tabs, choose the MLX file, then select Open.
MATLAB can convert an MLX file to an M source code file. To do this, select File → Save → Save As... in the "EDITOR" tab. Then, select "MATLAB Code files (*.m)" as the "Save as type".
